data.title: Major Food Group
data.meta_description: Welcome to the world of Major Food Group
data.text:
Major Food Group is one of the most celebrated, innovative, and successful companies in the history of the hospitality business. Founded a decade ago by Jeff Zalaznick, Mario Carbone, and Rich Torrisi, MFG has established a global empire that today exceeds forty restaurants, private clubs, bars, and hotels, along the way setting a new standard for the industry.

Among the brand’s numerous iconic concepts—which represent the pinnacle of experiential luxury in cities from New York and Las Vegas to Paris and Hong Kong—are Carbone, The Grill, Torrisi, ZZ’s Club, The Newbury Hotel, Villa Miami, etc. While each brand this creative force brings to life is distinct, they all reflect MFG’s refined, celebratory, and thoroughly contemporary approach to its craft.
